entry.title: Learned a new argument for cd command
entry.content:
It’s a nice post for “newbies”: The Designer’s Guide to the OSX Command Prompt - A Tutorial for the Modern Web Designer.

I googled around a little, learned that pwd stands for “Present Working Directory”…

But when I found out a “new” (new only for me) argument cd -, I hated myself for having missed such a useful functinality for years simply because I didn’t read the help!

entry.title: Got an auto-generated-toc for pages...
entry.content: Following the instruction of Brain Clapper’s post, “Generating a Table of Contents in Octopress”, I added an auto TOC for pages (rather than merely for post), see the result here: “Notes on Rails”.

entry.title: Hello
entry.content:
Set up a blog based on jeklly and octopress on http://github.com, and installed DarkStripes theme.

Learned a little bit markdown syntax. … and left “liquid” in the todo list.

Hello, world!
